sentences.en: A deluge of manuscripts began to arrive in the post.
sentences.cn: 大量的手稿开始通过邮递涌来。

sentences.en: a fence post
sentences.cn: 篱笆桩

sentences.en: All you do is complete and post off a form.
sentences.cn: 你所要做的就是填写并寄出表格。

sentences.en: Eddie parked his cycle against a lamp post and padlocked it.
sentences.cn: 埃迪把他的自行车靠在路灯柱上，用挂锁锁好。

sentences.en: Emma was opening her post .
sentences.cn: 埃玛正在拆邮件。

sentences.en: Goddard has held the post since 1998.
sentences.cn: 戈达德自1998年起一直担任该职务。

sentences.en: Grace Robertson started as a photographer with Picture Post in 1947.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯·罗伯逊于1947年参加工作，做了《图片邮报》杂志的一名摄影师。

sentences.en: He really was one of the finest boxers in post-war Britain.
sentences.cn: 他确实是战后英国最优秀的拳击手之一。

sentences.en: He rummaged around the post room and found the document.
sentences.cn: 他翻遍了收发室，找到了那份文件。

sentences.en: He will take up his post as Head of Modern Languages in September.
sentences.cn: 他将于9月份就任当代语言系系主任。

sentences.en: I applied for the post and was asked to attend an interview.
sentences.cn: 我申请了那个职位，被要求参加面试。

sentences.en: In the post-war years her writing regularly appeared in The New Journal.
sentences.cn: 她的文章在战后那几年经常出现在《新日报》上。

sentences.en: Mr Thomson resigned his £50,000 a year post in April.
sentences.cn: 4 月，汤姆森先生辞去了他年收入5万英镑的职位。

sentences.en: Now look yonder, just beyond the wooden post there.
sentences.cn: 看那边，就在木头柱子的旁边。

sentences.en: Pop it in the post, or get your secretary to fax it.
sentences.cn: 把它扔进邮筒，要不然就让你的秘书发份传真。

sentences.en: She had earlier resigned her post as President Menem's assistant.
sentences.cn: 她早些时候辞去了梅内姆总统助理一职。

sentences.en: She now holds a senior post in the Department of Education.
sentences.cn: 她目前在教育部担任高级职务。

sentences.en: She was offered the post of ambassador to India.
sentences.cn: 她被委任为驻印度大使。

sentences.en: She’s just gone to post a letter .
sentences.cn: 她刚出去寄信了。

sentences.en: the creation of 4,000 new teaching posts
sentences.cn: 创造4,000个新的教学职位

sentences.en: The exam results were posted on the bulletin board yesterday.
sentences.cn: 考试成绩昨天在布告板上贴出来了。

sentences.en: The house where she lives was once the village post office.
sentences.cn: 她现在住的房子曾经是村里的邮局。

sentences.en: The once-powerful post unions have been cut down to size.
sentences.cn: 一度很强势的邮政联盟已经威风不再。

sentences.en: The pilot wisely decided to return to Farnborough post haste.
sentences.cn: 飞行员明智地决定尽快返回法恩伯勒。

sentences.en: Unfortunately they were unable to find a suitable person to fill the post .
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是他们找不到一个合适的人选填补空缺。

sentences.en: Up to now the post of president has been largely ceremonial.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，总统一职在很大程度上只是礼仪性的。

sentences.en: Was there any post for me today?
sentences.cn: 今天有我的邮件吗？

sentences.en: We post up a set of rules for the house.
sentences.cn: 我们张贴了一份房屋生活守则。

words.tran_cn: 记录；[会计] 过帐；委派

phrases.tran_cn: 依据过去经济发展情形分析的
让某人了解最新进展；为某人提供最新消息
后置处理；后加工（错后处理，后部工艺）

trans.tran_cn: 邮政，邮件，邮班，职位，哨所，标志杆，终点标志，球门柱
trans.tran_en: letters, packages etc that are sent and delivered
the official system for carrying letters, packages etc from one place to another

trans.tran_cn: 邮寄，把…放入，派驻，站岗，张贴，发布，交付（保释金）
trans.tran_en: to put up a public notice about something on a wall or notice board

trans.tran_cn: 投寄； 邮寄； 发布
trans.tran_en: to send a letter, package etc by post
